instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.U5701: What is U5701? this is the keyboard controller chip that takes the keyboard and trackpad input and turns it into a USB device signal for the machine to process. If replacing a keyboard doesnâ€™t fix an issue with keys not typing, check all traces between keyboard connector and this IC. This chip has programming so it must be replaced from a similar, ideally identical board. .

threads.title: [SOLVED] 2879 keyboard connector
threads.message:
This is the first time I replace a keyboard connector. The old one was partly damaged.
Now all keys work except capslock. Nothing happens when i press it, no green light on button.
The keyboard is new and i tried other with same result.
What can by wrong? I checked all connections

threads.title: [SOLVED] 2879 keyboard connector
threads.message: Is it just the light that does not work or the key does nothing? If the key is not working there must be more keys that don't work or it is simply another bad keyboard.

threads.title: [SOLVED] 2879 keyboard connector
threads.message:
no light and no function. I think that I'll try another connector tomorrow.
Is there a schematic over the keyboard? What key goes to what pin?? didn't find on google

threads.title: [SOLVED] 2879 keyboard connector
threads.message: yes I understand what you are writing. It is only caps lock that doesn't work no matter what keyboard I'm using. J5714 pin 14?

threads.title: [SOLVED] 2879 keyboard connector
threads.message: As far as I know pin 14 is just for the LED. Just measure all pins on diode mode, probably bad soldering or bad connector.

threads.title: [SOLVED] 2879 keyboard connector
threads.message:
Found it. Bad trace between J5714 pin 15 and <CHIP>U5701</CHIP> pin 39. Noticed that P didn't work either. Now it's all perfect.
Thanks again for the help

threads.title: [SOLVED] 2879 keyboard connector
threads.message: That is why I asked f there were more keys that did not work....anyway it is fixed.
